title: wine_Chapel_Down_NV_Brut_Sparkling_(England)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 105542.
country: England.
description: The purest notion of Golden Pearmain apples is beguiling on the nose, promising fruit and mellowness in equal measure. The palate with its superfine and creamy mousse does not disappoint. Creamy, rich autolysis and ripe yellow apple create an elegant, generous and bright midpalate that's full of flavor and depth. It's harmonious, hitting that intersection of freshness and richness perfectly and finishing long..
designation: Brut.
points: 92.
price: 40.0.
province: England.
